item.title: About
item.description: Yushi Omote Rust, C/C++, Python, x86/64, Virtualization, Giroppon, Fintech Professional history Oct 2015 – Current Engineer, SBI BITS (Better IT Solutions). Apr 2014 – Sep 2015 Research Fellow, University of Tsukuba / Japan Society for the Promotion of Science. May 2012 – Mar 2014 Contract Researcher, National Institute for Agro-Environmental Sciences. Publications OS-Independent Live Migration Scheme for Bare-metal Clouds.
